title: League freezing
body: I can play at least 3 other games at once with max everything for graphics perfectly. But the moment I just try to open leagues client and click launch. My computer freezes and turns black. It is really annoying and I don't know if re installing is the answer

replies.body: Sometimes those black screens can be a sign that your network is having problems getting a solid connection with our login servers, so I want to go ahead and double check those settings really quickly just to make sure we cover all our bases. Run through out [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly and let me know how that helps.
So it just made my game slower. The problem is whenever I try to type I crash
